Starting point for the fluent interface for invoking constructors using reflection.

O

ofType(Class<T>) - Method in class org.fest.reflect.field.Name
Sets the type of the field to access.
org.fest.reflect - package org.fest.reflect
Provides a Fluent Interface that makes usage of the Java Reflection API easier and improves code readability.
org.fest.reflect.constructor - package org.fest.reflect.constructor
Provides a Fluent Interface for constructor invocation via the Reflection API.
org.fest.reflect.field - package org.fest.reflect.field
Provides a Fluent Interface for field access via the Reflection API.
org.fest.reflect.method - package org.fest.reflect.method
Provides a Fluent Interface for method invocation via the Reflection API.
